Detailed Description

template<class RxFields, class TxFields, class Crc = CrcSoft>
class proto::ProtocolNoSysEndpoint< RxFields, TxFields, Crc >

Protocol endpoint base for protocol implementations.

Template Parameters
RxFieldsProtocol RX field set.
TxFieldsProtocol TX field set.
CrcCRC type for integrity.

Responsibilities:

  • Handles RX/TX containers.
  • Snapshots the last received frame's type code (payload can be extracted on-demand via wait_once).
  • Provides thread-safe access and waiting.
  • Allows user RX callback hooks.

Lifecycle:

  • Construct, wire interfaces, use send/wait methods, query snapshot.

Construct endpoint and install a permanent RX callback that snapshots the last frame's type code.

Note
A permanent RX callback is installed that snapshots the last received type code.

◆ m_rx_callback

template<class RxFields, class TxFields, class Crc = CrcSoft>
RxCont::CallbackType proto::ProtocolNoSysEndpoint< RxFields, TxFields, Crc >::m_rx_callback
protected
Initial value:
{[this](auto& container) {
if (container.is_debug()) {
std::cout << " \n\n Packet is received!!\n" << '\n';
container.for_each_type([&](auto& field) { field.print(); });
}
if (m_user_callback) {
m_user_callback(container.get_named_copies());
} else {
m_rx_queue.emplace_back(container.get_named_copies());
if (m_rx_queue.size() > m_max_deque_size) {
m_rx_queue.pop_front();
}
}
}}
